title: AI Voice Assistant
description: A Python-based intelligent voice assistant with speech recognition, NLP-based intent detection, contextual memory, and system automation.

title: Flask Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio built using Flask with admin dashboard, contact form, CSV-based message storage, and secure deployment practices.

title: Whether web page
description: A responsive whether page built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, deployed with GitHub Pages.

title: Notes App
description: A full-stack notes application built with node.js and express that allows users to create, edit, and manage notes. Deployed on Render.
